channel.title: Go-Mod
channel.description:
Hello everyone, im co-creator of mod called Go-Mod. This is sandbox mod for Gold Source engine, similar to the Garry`s Mod. Because it`s on GoldSource you can`t except any goodies from Garry`s Mod.
[b]Physics gun[/b]
Tools :
Duplicator Render Tool Camera Tool Poser Tool Remover Gib Tool
Weapons : All weapons known from Half-Life. Most of weapons known from Counter-Strike.
Props : 6 custom props for now. However, you can`t add custom props, you can only replace actual ones.
If you like GoldSource, maybe it`s for you. If not, just leave comment below.

item.title: Go-Mod
item.dc:creator: Nerdguy
item.description:
Played it, kinda fun i guess…
Also the poser is on version 3.4 (now using 3.5)

Read full topic

item.title: Go-Mod
item.dc:creator: Cool2
item.description:
I’ve seen and played this mod, it’s basically a crappy version of Gmod, a lot of shit is ported from HL2, and you can only play around with NPCs, no thanks…

Read full topic

item.title: Go-Mod
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
When did you add the poser element? I was recently testing it out for my Half-Life Mod Let’s Play, and I don’t recall the poser. I don’t know if I recall a gravity gun, either, though maybe since I already knew of the one in Scientist Slaughterhouse, it didn’t seem surprising enough to remember.

Also, you might want to post a download link, especially since there’s like 50 versions and patches of your mod flying around the web and getting an old one wouldn’t be so great.

Read full topic

item.title: Go-Mod
item.dc:creator: deredevil
item.description:
sounds cool

Read full topic

item.title: Go-Mod
item.dc:creator: supra36
item.description:
Hello everyone, im co-creator of mod called Go-Mod. This is sandbox mod for Gold Source engine, similar to the Garrys Mod. Because its on GoldSource you cant except any goodies from Garrys Mod.

Physics gun

Tools :

Duplicator
Render Tool
Camera Tool
Poser Tool
Remover
Gib Tool

Weapons :
All weapons known from Half-Life.
Most of weapons known from Counter-Strike.

Props :
6 custom props for now. However, you can`t add custom props, you can only replace actual ones.

If you like GoldSource, maybe it`s for you. If not, just leave comment below.

Read full topic
